definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: A feeding funnel is added, and the mechanized drying for dilute fluid is realized.
sentences.chinese: 並增加了進料斗，使稀液體的烘乾實現機械化。

sentences.english: Loosens rotates boom's stopping nut, promotes the hopper changes to the next working procedure.
sentences.chinese: 鬆開迴轉叉架的鎖緊螺母，將料斗推出轉到下一工序。

sentences.english: The hopper is arranged on the rear upside of the machine tube.
sentences.chinese: 料斗設置於機筒後端上側。

sentences.english: Author sugests last the design principles for storehopper.
sentences.chinese: 最後介紹了貯料斗的設計原則。

sentences.english: On the way, you will need to drop-off the hopper on the Montebello industrial wye and continue.
sentences.chinese: 在路上，您將需要落料斗的蒙特貝羅工業懷並繼續。

sentences.english: Must clean the dust bin and hopper after work.
sentences.chinese: 每班工作完成後，必須清洗車廂和料斗。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic Vibration Hopper is a widely used automatic feeding device.
sentences.chinese: 電磁振動料斗是應用很廣的自動供料裝置。

sentences.english: Suitable for weighing belts and hoper scales.
Large infeed hopper for feeding from all sides.
sentences.chinese: 各面都裝有大型橫向進料斗。

sentences.english: Raw oil shale is transported into four measuring bins by belt conveyers.
sentences.chinese: 油母頁岩原礦通過帶式運輸機送至四個量料斗。

sentences.english: The vibrating hopper usually adopts the directional mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 振動料斗通常採用這種定向機構。

definition: to feed (a machine)/foreign goods (abbr. of 進口資料|进口资料)
aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
